short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Achieve instant academic success and gratification by hidding rejected papers from PCS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a button to PCS to achieve instant and free academic success by hidding rejected papers.

If you want to feel miserable again, click again

Also adds the ability to sort your papers per year.

Source code available there : https://github.com/Karalix/pcs-zen
